data.title: Simply Red
data.meta_description: Simply Red is an English pop band whose songs "Heaven" (in "Trust Fund Pirates" and "Viking Bikers from Hell"), "Picture Book" (from "The Good Collar"), and "Holding Back the Years" (from "By Hooker by Crook") of the series Miami Vice. The band was formed in 1985 out the remnants of a previous...
data.text:
Miami Vice Performer

Members (1985)

Mick Hucknall (vocals)

Tony Bowers (bass)

Fritz McIntyre (keyboards)

Tim Killett (brass)

Sylvan Richardson (guitar)

Chris Joyce (drums)

Active

1985-2010

2015-present

Simply Red is an English pop band whose songs "Heaven" (in "Trust Fund Pirates" and "Viking Bikers from Hell"), "Picture Book" (from "The Good Collar"), and "Holding Back the Years" (from "By Hooker by Crook") of the series Miami Vice.

Career[]
